verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָזָ֔ה <WH2372> did see יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <WH3470> which Isaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אָמֽוֹץ׃ <WH531> of Amoz

עַ֤ל <WH5921> and הַר־ <WH2022> mountain נִשְׁפֶּה֙ <WH8192> upon the high שְֽׂאוּ־ <WH5375> Lift ye up נֵ֔ס <WH5251> a banner הָרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> exalt ק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice לָהֶ֑ם הָנִ֣יפוּ <WH5130> unto them shake יָ֔ד <WH3027> the hand וְיָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> that they may go פִּתְחֵ֥י <WH6607> into the gates נְדִיבִֽים׃ <WH5081> of the nobles

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I צִוֵּ֖יתִי <WH6680> I have commanded לִמְקֻדָּשָׁ֑י <WH6942> my sanctified ones גַּ֣ם <WH1571> have even קָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> I have also called גִבּוֹרַי֙ <WH1368> my mighty ones לְאַפִּ֔י <WH639> for mine anger עַלִּיזֵ֖י <WH5947> [even] them that rejoice גַּאֲוָתִֽי׃ <WH1346> in my highness

ק֥וֹל <WH6963> The noise הָמ֛וֹן <WH1995> of a multitude בֶּֽהָרִ֖ים <WH2022> in the mountains דְּמ֣וּת <WH1823> like as עַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֑ב <WH7227> of a great ק֠וֹל <WH6963> noise שְׁא֞וֹן <WH7588> a tumultuous מַמְלְכ֤וֹת <WH4467> of the kingdoms גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of nations נֶֽאֱסָפִ֔ים <WH622> gathered together יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מְפַקֵּ֖ד <WH6485> mustereth צְבָ֥א <WH6635> the host מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of the battle

בָּאִ֛ים <WH935> They come מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country מֶרְחָ֖ק <WH4801> from a far מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> from the end הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [even] the LORD וּכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> and the weapons זַעְמ֔וֹ <WH2195> of his indignation לְחַבֵּ֖ל <WH2254> to destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the whole land

הֵילִ֕ילוּ <WH3213> Howl כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָר֖וֹב <WH7138> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <WH3117> ye for the day יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּשֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> as a destruction מִשַּׁדַּ֥י <WH7706> from the Almighty יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> it shall come

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָדַ֣יִם <WH3027> Therefore shall all hands תִּרְפֶּ֑ינָה <WH7503> be faint וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every לְבַ֥ב <WH3824> heart אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH582> and every man's יִמָּֽס׃ <WH4549> shall melt

וְֽנִבְהָ֓לוּ ׀ <WH926> And they shall be afraid צִירִ֤ים <WH6735> pangs וַֽחֲבָלִים֙ <WH2256> and sorrows יֹֽאחֵז֔וּן <WH270> shall take hold כַּיּוֹלֵדָ֖ה <WH3205> as a woman that travaileth יְחִיל֑וּן <WH2342> of them they shall be in pain אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> at another יִתְמָ֔הוּ <WH8539> they shall be amazed פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> their faces לְהָבִ֖ים <WH3851> [shall be as] flames פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> their faces

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold יוֹם־ <WH3117> Behold the day יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֔א <WH935> cometh אַכְזָרִ֥י <WH394> cruel וְעֶבְרָ֖ה <WH5678> both with wrath וַחֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> and fierce אָ֑ף <WH639> anger לָשׂ֤וּם <WH7760> to lay הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> desolate וְחַטָּאֶ֖יהָ <WH2400> the sinners יַשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> and he shall destroy מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כוֹכְבֵ֤י <WH3556> For the stars הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of heaven וּכְסִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3685> and the constellations לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יָהֵ֖לּוּ <WH1984> thereof shall not give אוֹרָ֑ם <WH216> their light חָשַׁ֤ךְ <WH2821> shall be darkened הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> the sun בְּצֵאת֔וֹ <WH3318> in his going forth וְיָרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> and the moon לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַגִּ֥יהַ <WH5050> to shine אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <WH216> shall not cause her light

וּפָקַדְתִּ֤י <WH6485> And I will punish עַל־ <WH5921> and תֵּבֵל֙ <WH8398> the world רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> for [their] evil וְעַל־ <WH5921> and רְשָׁעִ֖ים <WH7563> and the wicked עֲוֹנָ֑ם <WH5771> for their iniquity וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <WH7673> to cease גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> and I will cause the arrogancy זֵדִ֔ים <WH2086> of the proud וְגַאֲוַ֥ת <WH1346> the haughtiness עָרִיצִ֖ים <WH6184> of the terrible אַשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <WH8213> and will lay low
אוֹקִ֥יר <WH3365> more precious אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH376> he מִפָּ֑ז <WH6337> than fine gold וְאָדָ֖ם <WH120> even a man מִכֶּ֥תֶם <WH3800> than the golden wedge אוֹפִֽיר׃ <WH211> of Ophir

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> the heavens אַרְגִּ֔יז <WH7264> Therefore I will shake וְתִרְעַ֥שׁ <WH7493> shall remove הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth מִמְּקוֹמָ֑הּ <WH4725> out of her place בְּעֶבְרַת֙ <WH5678> in the wrath יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּבְי֖וֹם <WH3117> and in the day חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> of his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> anger

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become כִּצְבִ֣י <WH6643> roe מֻדָּ֔ח <WH5080> And it shall be as the chased וּכְצֹ֖אן <WH6629> and as a sheep וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> none מְקַבֵּ֑ץ <WH6908> that no man taketh up אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> they shall every man אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמּוֹ֙ <WH5971> to his own people יִפְנ֔וּ <WH6437> turn וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> to his אַרְצ֖וֹ <WH776> into his own land יָנֽוּסוּ׃ <WH5127> and flee

כָּל־ <WH3605> Anyone הַנִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> Every one that is found יִדָּקֵ֑ר <WH1856> shall be thrust through וְכָל־ <WH3605> and anyone הַנִּסְפֶּ֖ה <WH5595> and every one that is joined יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> [unto them] shall fall בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> by the sword

וְעֹלְלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5768> Their children יְרֻטְּשׁ֖וּ <WH7376> also shall be dashed to pieces לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> before their eyes יִשַּׁ֙סּוּ֙ <WH8155> shall be spoiled בָּֽתֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH1004> their houses וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> and their wives [תִּשָּׁגַלְנָה כ] (תִּשָּׁכַֽבְנָה׃ <WH7693> lie with ק)

הִנְנִ֛י <WH2005> I am going מֵעִ֥יר <WH5782> Behold I will stir up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> מָדָ֑י <WH4074> the Medes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Who כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> silver לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יַחְשֹׁ֔בוּ <WH2803> against them which shall not regard וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and [as for] gold לֹ֥א <WH3808> or יַחְפְּצוּ־ <WH2654> they shall not delight בֽוֹ׃

וּקְשָׁת֖וֹת <WH7198> [Their] bows נְעָרִ֣ים <WH5288> the young men תְּרַטַּ֑שְׁנָה <WH7376> to pieces וּפְרִי־ <WH6529> on the fruit בֶ֙טֶן֙ <WH990> of the womb לֹ֣א <WH3808> even יְרַחֵ֔מוּ <WH7355> and they shall have no pity עַל־ <WH5921> and בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תָח֥וּס <WH2347> shall not spare עֵינָֽם׃ <WH5869> their eye

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become בָבֶל֙ <WH894> And Babylon צְבִ֣י <WH6643> the glory מַמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> of kingdoms תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> the beauty גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> excellency כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldees' כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֣ת <WH4114> overthrew אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> shall be as when God אֶת־ <WH853> סְדֹ֖ם <WH5467> Sodom וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲמֹרָֽה׃ <WH6017> and Gomorrah

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor תֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> be inhabited לָנֶ֔צַח <WH5331> It shall never וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor תִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <WH7931> neither shall it be dwelt עַד־ <WH5704> from דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> in from generation וָד֑וֹר <WH1755> to generation וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יַהֵ֥ל <WH167> pitch tent שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there עֲרָבִ֔י <WH6163> neither shall the Arabian וְרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> there neither shall the shepherds לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יַרְבִּ֥צוּ <WH7257> make their fold שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְרָבְצוּ־ <WH7257> shall lie שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there צִיִּ֔ים <WH6728> But wild beasts of the desert וּמָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> shall be full בָתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> there and their houses אֹחִ֑ים <WH255> of doleful creatures וְשָׁ֤כְנוּ <WH7931> shall dwell שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> first יַֽעֲנָ֔ה <WH3284> Ostriches וּשְׂעִירִ֖ים <WH8163> there and satyrs יְרַקְּדוּ־ <WH7540> shall dance שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְעָנָ֤ה <WH6030> shall cry אִיִּים֙ <WH338> And the wild beasts of the islands בְּאַלְמנוֹתָ֔יו <WH490> in their desolate houses וְתַנִּ֖ים <WH8577> and dragons בְּהֵ֣יכְלֵי <WH1964> palaces עֹ֑נֶג <WH6027> in [their] pleasant וְקָר֤וֹב <WH7138> [is] near לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> to come עִתָּ֔הּ <WH6256> and her time וְיָמֶ֖יהָ <WH3117> and her days לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִמָּשֵֽׁכוּ׃ <WH4900> shall not be prolonged
